name: Car Fog Light Wiring Harness Kit,Car Accessories,H8/ H9/ H11 Fog Light Harness Connector,Waterproof Pigtail Adapter Plug,Used to Stabilize The Headlight to Turn Fog Lights (2PCS)
short_description: [High-Quality Materials]: The car fog lamp harness connector is made of high-quality plastic and metal copper materials, which is durable, high temperature resistant, highly conductive and has a long service life.
[Product Function]: The car fog lamp harness connector can be used to replace old or damaged fog lamps and headlights, etc., and can help repair poor contact or other fault problems.

[Easy to Use]: The car fog lamp harness connector is simple to use, has strong bearing capacity and stable performance. The input voltage of the fog lamp harness connector with wires is 12V, which can replace H8/H9/H11 LED bulbs.

[Easy Installation]: The car fog lamp harness connector is easy to install, and can directly replace the old parts and directly install the new harness connector. It is plug-and-play, safe and reliable.

[Wide Application]: The car fog lamp harness connector is suitable for most cars, trucks, SUVs, etc. It is very suitable for stabilizing headlights, fog lamps and small lamps, reducing the probability of short circuits.

product_description: Description: The wiring harness for LED off road light is the perfect accessory for off road automobiles, working vehicles, and most automobile that could use a relay to power specific equipment. Consisting of a 40 Amp relay, an illuminated on/off rocker switch, and more than 10.7ft of wiring, this wiring harness for LED off road lights simplifies the installation process of powering various equipment on automobiles. Specifications: Material: Plastic Color: Black Relay: 12V 40A Cable Length: approx. 3.26m/10.7ft Package Weight: approx.209g Fitment: Universal Package Included: 1 * Fog Light Switch Wiring Kit Installation: (Just for reference) 1. connect the the red+ wire from the fuse to battery +; connect the black wire from the reply to the battery -. 2. connect the wire for lights bar from the relay; (red/black correspond to the wire of lights bar). 3. connect the red +/black- wire of the switch to battery or any place of your car system to get power for the switch. 4. turn on on/off button of switch to test the lights bar. Notes: 1. Easy to install, but professional installation is highly recommended! 2. Please allow 1-3cm error due to manual measurement. Thanks for understanding.

short_description: 【Dynamic Demon Eye Effect】Upgrade your headlights or fog lights with powerful LED demon eye headlights that deliver vivid, animated eye patterns. The blinking devil eyes bring a bold, aggressive style that turns heads both day and night—perfect for car lovers seeking a standout look.

【6 Animated Eye Modes】Choose from 6 unique lighting patterns and 1 continuous loop animation. Use the included remote control to easily switch between eye-catching modes and show off your ride’s personality on the road or at car shows.

【High-Definition Lens and Durable Build】Crafted with a premium ABS shell and HD lens, these LED car eyes are built to last. The lights are water-resistant, dust-proof, shockproof, and heat-resistant—offering stable, low-power performance in all weather conditions.

【Easy Installation and Universal Fit】Each eyeball light includes a 5-foot cable for flexible placement. Simply connect the red wire to the positive and the black wire to the negative terminal. Compatible with 12V to 36V vehicles including cars, motorcycles, trucks, SUVs, and more. Please verify size before installation.

【Complete Package with Remote Control】Includes 2 LED devil eye lights and 1 wireless remote. Control your demon headlights without opening the hood. For any product issues or questions, SPNANMA provides fast and friendly support within 12 hours.
